00019 #ifndef SONBLOCKHEADER_H
00020 #define SONBLOCKHEADER_H
00021 
00022 #include <stdint.h>
00023 
00024 #include "sonerror.h"
00025 #include "sonchannelinfo.h"
00026 
00027 class SONFile;
00028 
00032 class SONBlockHeaders
00033 {
00034         friend class SONExtractor;
00035 
00036         public:
00040                 static const int diskBlock;
00041 
00042         public:
00047         SONBlockHeaders();
00053         SONBlockHeaders(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel);
00059         virtual inline void init(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel);
00063                 virtual ~SONBlockHeaders();
00067                 virtual void read() throw (SONError);
00071                 virtual void readNext() throw (SONError);
00075                 virtual inline int64_t getNSamples() const;
00080                 virtual inline uint32_t getNBlocks() const;
00086                 virtual inline int64_t getBlockOffset(uint32_t block) const;
00092                 virtual inline uint16_t getNSamplesInBlock(uint16_t i) const;
00093 
00094         private:
00095 
00096                 SONFile                 *file;
00097                 uint16_t                        channel;
00098                 uint32_t                        nBlocks;
00099                 uint32_t                        currentBlock;
00100                 int64_t                 *blockOffset;
00101                 int32_t                 nBlockOffset;
00102                 int64_t                 *nextBlockOffset;
00103                 int32_t                 *start;
00104                 int32_t                 *stop;
00105                 uint16_t                        *nSamplesInBlock;
00106                 int64_t                 nSamples;
00107 };
00108 
00109 void SONBlockHeaders::init(SONFile *file,uint16_t channel)
00110 {
00111         this->file = file;
00112         this->channel = channel;
00113 }
00114 
00115 int64_t SONBlockHeaders::getNSamples() const
00116 {
00117         return nSamples;
00118 }
00119 
00120 int64_t SONBlockHeaders::getBlockOffset(uint32_t block) const
00121 {
00122         // This takes into account differences between file format versions (pre vs post 9)
00123         if ( block > nBlocks ) return 0;
00124         else return blockOffset[block];
00125 }
00126 
00127 uint32_t SONBlockHeaders::getNBlocks() const
00128 {
00129         // This takes into account differences between file format versions (pre vs post 9)
00130         return nBlocks;
00131 }
00132 
00133 uint16_t SONBlockHeaders::getNSamplesInBlock(uint16_t i) const
00134 {
00135         if ( i > nBlocks ) return 0;
00136         else return nSamplesInBlock[i];
00137 }
